start.text: Let's have some fun. Safety overrides!
Alright alright, boys. Let's see what we got.
Ah, yeah. Time for a little test run.

start_boss.text: Hit the overrides!! We're in for some fun!
Now we've got some REAL action!

retreat.text: Sure beats getting blown to shreds.

out_of_missiles.text: Shoulda gone for the expanded racks.
I got this, missiles or no missiles.

engaged.text: You don't know who you're up against!

need_help.text: I'm in a bit of trouble!
Could use some cover fire over here!

pursuing.text: This one's goin' in my trophy case.
Finally figured out who you're up against, huh?
This one's got a life expectancy shorter than the High Hegemon! HAH!

running.text: They've got some fight in em'. I'll jump back into the fray in just a minute.

hull_90.text: Nice, gettin' some real action over here.
Barely a dent. That all they got?

hull_50.text: Rch! Commander, you promised me a REAL challenge!
That ain't all they got, brace up!
Armor's shredded! We've still got some fight in us!

hull_30.text: Haven't gone critical yet! Let's show em' who's boss!
If we lose now, the commander's gonna have our heads!

overload.text: Damn! Cover us while we cool down!
Flux is arcing everywhere. We got too confident.
Conduits burnt out. Now we've got some action!

death.text: They got me fair and square. Damn-!
What do you MEAN the reactor's- *Static*
You better drag my hardsuit outta here, commander!

victory.text: Hah, that's some sweet bridge cam footage.
Hell yeah! Was that some nice flying, or what?

victory_boss.text: This one's goin' down in history!
